# Science

Science is the search for good explanations that are falsifiable via tests, as per the [criterion of Demarcation].

Many say that discovering truth is the objective of science. However, truth is not the only aim of science: we want truth that is interesting and hard to come by; we want solutions to problems[^awoich3].
